_header: How should I rule me or in what wise
_description: William Dunbar, ‘How sall I governe me’ — ten 5-line stanzas with this refrain ‘lord god how sould I governe me’

CULLl510.First Lines:
Ho[w] sould I rewll me or in quhat wysI wald sum wys man wald
                    devys…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…Lat everie man say quhat he willThe gracious god mot governe
                    me
CULLl510.Note:
10 x 5, aabab, with refrain, ‘Lord god low sall I governe
                    me’
CULLl510.Editions:
MacKenzie,  William Mackay. 
             The Poems of William Dunbar.
         Edinburgh, 1932: 24-6.

                    dewys…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…Lat euerie man say quhat he willThe gratious god mot governe
                    me

Banna.First Lines:
How sowld I rewill me Or quhat wyisI wald sum wyisman wald
                    dewyis…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Latt every man say quhat he willthe gratious god mot governe
                    me
